This endpoint multi search for movies, TV shows and people in a single request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"query","required":true,"in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","example":"animation"}},{"name":"include_adult","in":"query","schema":{"type":"boolean","default":false}},{"name":"page","in":"query","schema":{"type":"integer","default":1}},{"name":"language","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","default":"en-US"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
